spam_button.description: Generates a sequence of button presses to be executed automatically. Useful for mashing through text or menus. Can optionally include delays.
spam_button.python_script:
import json
button = input_data['button']
times = int(input_data['times'])
delay = int(input_data.get('delay_ms', 0))

presses = []
for _ in range(times):
    presses.append(button)
    if delay > 0:
        presses.append(f"sleep {delay}")

print(json.dumps(presses))
